summary:
Do you love the effect of the Ebony Mail, but hate the armor because it\'s heavy, \"ugly,\" or doesn\'t go with your current outfit?

I have a fix for that. 

This mod will give the smoke effect from the Ebony Mail to the Nightingale Armor.
descriptionHtml:
Nightingale Armor w/ Ebony Smoke
Author: Carroto
-----------------------------

Tutorial for installing mods:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sLOCk4YqKoM&feature=related

However, for the most part you just stick them in your \"data\" folder in your Skyrim directory.


-----------------------------


This .esp will give the enchantment of the \"Ebony Mail\" to the \"Nightingale Armor.\"

- Smoke effect and poisoning of enemies included

- Slightly updated stats of the armor

- Ebony Mail remains unchanged


--------------
Bugs:

None
author: Carroto
